# LiquidSat - Bitcoin Liquidity Platform

## About
LiquidSat is a Bitcoin liquidity platform that allows users to unlock capital from their Bitcoin holdings without selling. We provide Bitcoin-backed loans and lending services.

## Main Features
- Bitcoin-backed loans
- Instant liquidity access
- Competitive interest rates
- No selling required
- Secure Bitcoin custody
- Flexible loan terms

## Use Cases
- Access liquidity while maintaining Bitcoin position
- Borrow against Bitcoin collateral
- Lend Bitcoin to earn yield
- Unlock capital for business or personal needs

## Key Information
- Platform: Bitcoin DeFi
- Service: Bitcoin lending and borrowing
- Website: https://liquidsat.com
- Focus: Bitcoin liquidity solutions

## Technology
- Lightning Network integration
- Secure multi-signature custody
- Real-time Bitcoin price feeds
- Automated liquidation protection

> For detailed documentation, visit https://liquidsat.com/llms-full.txt
